name: THE WEDDING SILK SANTAL | 36 Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Sparkling Champagne, White Freesia, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:The Wedding Silk Santal 36 surprises with a playful opening of sparkling champagne and silky white freesia, while pink praline and lush nectarine dominate the heart of this romantic fragrance. The sweetness of sugared musk and the creamy sandalwood perfectly round out this dazzling scent as a toast to the celebration of love..About the Bottle:KAYALIu2019s signature diamond-shaped bottles and opulent jeweled caps are inspired by traditional Middle Eastern oud bottles..About the Fragrance:Designed as an ode to everlasting love, Mona and Hassan created the Wedding Collection to wear on their special day. Inspired by the beautiful bond that unites these twin flames, The Wedding Silk Santal 36 and The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 are bound by the strength of creamy sandalwood. Also known as santal, this hero note grounds each scent while also glorifying the unique blend of decadent ingredients found in each bottle. Timeless when worn alone, yet amplified when layered together, these juices are made to be shared and celebrate love in all its forms.
ingredients: Sd Alcohol 40-B/Alcohol Denat., Fragrance/Parfum, Water/Aqua/Eau, Coumarin, Farnesol, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on your pulse points: inside of the wrists, behind the knees, the center of the chest, nape of the neck, behind the ears, and clothes for a more potent scent trail. .-For even longer wear, be sure to moisturize with balm or lotion before spritzing on the body. .-For a delicate diffusion, spray on your hair towel before drying your hair or directly onto your hairbrush before styling...Monau2019s favorite layering combos:.The Wedding Silk Santal 36 & The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 (sold separately):.For a captivating and comforting combo bound by the signature note of sandalwood...The Wedding Silk Santal 36 & Deju00e0 Vu White Flower 57 (sold separately):.For a seductive yet sophisticated combination...The Wedding Silk Santal 36 & Yum Pistachio Gelato 33 (sold separately):.For an uplifting and irresistibly edible scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy for me, and I ended up loving it! I find myself reaching for it nearly every day, and I have a big collection! Itu2019s so nice for layering as it adds a nice powdery sweetness. Kayali always hits the mark for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In LOVE with this perfume. Smells amazing.  Doesnu2019t last super long though, but long enough. Many compliments though. Perfect for gourmand girlies wanting to dip their toes into other scent types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent but I'm surprised at how poor the longevity of it is. It fades within an hour or two, for the price of it I would say it's not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of a few perfumes I get compliments on and I have a pretty decent collection. The dry down is where I fell in love with it. Itu2019s a toned down Vanilla 28. It was not love at first sniff. Give it a chance to dry down

reviews.review_title: One of the best kayali fragrances
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love silk Santal so much, love the bottle, I wish it came in 100ml, I will be buying more so I donu2019t run out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING. Definitely one of my most favourite perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this perfume, the majority of the notes and feedback/reviews all lined up with a perfume that I would gravitate to. However, there is a note in this perfume that is very sharp and intense that hits the back of my throat for some reason. Because of this it actually nearly made me gag when I first tried it and gave me a crazy headache. Just turned out to be really not for me at all, I had to return it. Definitely not a safe blind buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Silk Santal is absolutely delightful and easily ranks in my top 3 Kayali fragrances. It has all the qualities of a perfect signature scent, soft, non-offensive, and effortlessly elegant while still leaving the most beautiful, lingering trail.

Only giving this a 4 star because I expected something really unique. Smells almost identical to vanilla 28 on the dry down. I like the smell so I wonu2019t return, but the main thing I like about it is how long is lasts on skin. I love kayali but one thing I notice is that the fragrances donu2019t always last. But this one last allll day! To the point where I may like it more than my vanilla 28 because they smell the same but this one last 10x longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning scent profile! I get strong sweet champagne vanilla notes from it that last all day. To me it smells like a combination of Vanilla 28 and Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar made unique by the champagne notes. Buy it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy for me. It opened with a sparkling burst of champagne and juicy floral fruits that struck me as very unique and beautiful, but these notes faded within ten minutes to a soft, creamy musk with floral undertones that smells exactly like Flowerbomb after 4-5 hours of drydown. Why five stars? I actually love Flowerbomb's drydown and have been searching for a perfume that matches this profile (I don't have the patience to sit through the initial florals, which are lovely but irritate my sensitive nose). I wish the champagne and fruits lasted longer, but it's still 5 stars for me because I really have been looking for this fragrance and can see myself wearing it often -- I just didn't expect to find it with Wedding Silk Santal. Those of you who prefer strong projection or are looking for a more unique champagne fragrance will probably want to skip this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A stable for champagne lovers with a hint of vanilla and sandalwood ! We need a bigger bottle please !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got 4 bottles and have 3 left. Itu2019s truly amazing.

reviews.review_title: Let it age and get dark itu2019s amazing!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: okay at first i was not the biggest fan it smelled too much like mod vanilla but that was before i found out that this perfume ages and it is actually so amazing now that has aged and got darker like it lasts way longer and i can actually smell the other notes the perfume has

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is over hyped no shade this smells really good donu2019t get me wrong and has good staying power / projection(for me) however! i just recently purchased casablanca by Swiss Arabian and mannnn these smell so similar to me (definitely not a dupe) but they share a similar vibe anywho i do still love the fragrance and would probably say this is my top 3 out of the 5 i have smelt u2026 also please bring back musk 12!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This isu2026.okay? I was very disappointed because itu2019s so overhyped. It smells exactly like vanilla 28 I donu2019t get any of the citrus or sparkling notes on my skin just straight up vanilla 28. I will be returning this Marshmallow

reviews.review_title: Disappointed bc itu2019s nothing as described
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gave to my 19-year-old daughter who just likes sweet stuff. Waited almost 2 years for this and very disappointed . Her vanilla patchouly Royale is a much better buy. Itu2019s a lighter version of vanilla 28 with a slightly more forward sweet musk. No depth. Itu2019s a pretty scent, nice if you want a lighter version of v28. The disappointment came from none of the described notes being in the fragrance  No champagne.No nectarine. I was expecting effervescent light fruity floral with. Tinge of her signature sweetness. I thought this would give fresh flirty grown up.   I wanted dolce and Gabbana light blue summer vibes with more champagne and sweetness, .It gives watery sweet vanilla. Again nice scent for a lighter version of v28. I like it. Just not what it advertised

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely obsessed with this fragrance. Itsu2019s so feminine and sparkling. I have had so many people compliment me. It last for about 6 hours, longer on clothes. I keep smelling myself.  Iu2019m definitely going to order another bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing smell. My sister sprayed this on herself one night before us going out and I had to buy my own

This smells amazing in the opening. after it dries down, it smells very similar to mon guerlain with added Kayali vanilla 28. my sprayer came broken. The plastic cap came off, but the metal is stuck to the sprayer.

reviews.review_title: Had to get it for my collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent.  It's so soft and inviting.  I didn't buy just one but I also bought the 10ml...Definitely a must have!ud83eudd70

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started off by getting three sample bottles of this, the first time I sprayed it it was really sweet I picked up on a praline note right away something really sweet. every time I wear this fragrance I have gotten compliments people asking me the name of the fragrance that I'm wearing. I really love this fragrance I actually ended up getting two full bottles, it's sweet, pretty,  and I'd have to say the longevity is pretty good actually. I do have to respray throughout the day so it isn't complete beast mode however it's a beautiful fragrance and very girly, I'm happy with it.

reviews.review_title: the perfect day or night scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this scent. Feels light and airy but also has a slight musk. RUN to get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: If kayali 28 and kaylai rock sugar had a baby. I like it; I'm hoping after a little maceration I may love it. : )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad this perfume is back, I missed out the first time it launched but got a chance to get sample and immediately fell in love. On the first spray you get this beautiful, sophisticated sweet champagne then dries down to a sweet musky, woodiness with a touch of nectar. It's perfect going out on date or formal event fragrance, I eally love this scent and I hope to see it in a 100ml.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why all the negative reviews. This scent is perfectly balanced with light, sugary notes mixed with a sexy earthy smell. It smells different as you wear it and I think it's definitely perfect for our wedding day.

reviews.review_title: Smells cheap like gross B&BW spray
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is no depth in this perfume, it's sharp and offensive. Smells so cheap and gross (like a cheap teenagery body spray), luckily I tried it out at home because I had to shower off the scent (yes, it's that bad). My family asked what I had on with grossed out faces lol. Don't fall for the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this scent, soooo delicious and sweet. i bought the travel size first and loved it so much, I had to size up. and the bottles are so gorgeous, it looks so cute on my perfume tray.

reviews.review_title: Not love at first sniff... But I'm glad I kept her
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the small bottle when it first came out. While I thought it was nice I was not impressed. It was a light fizzy little summer scent to me. I don't think I even wore it again after that first wear test. When it was re-released and everyone was all hyped up about it I went back to my bottle. I was blown away. It's so rich and warm and sexy. This is definitely how you want to smell on your wedding night. I ordered another bottle.

reviews.review_title: Worth having in your collection for vanilla fans
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this in the small size with my own money, non-incentivized. I'd probably buy it again, because it reminds me of a slightly fresher Burberry Goddess without the lavender, which is nice because sometimes that lavender is too distinct to me, and I love vanillas of all sorts. There's a distinct soap-y element to it if you put your nose close to it, which I think should be the advertised woodsiness, which I hope will die down as the perfume macerates and the vanilla profile rounds itself out, as vanillas tend to do. Sillage is impressive on clothing for Kayali, not so much on skin. I'm not getting fruitiness or champagne at all, but then again I've only had the perfume for not very long. Longevity is questionable at best, but I bought it in the travel size so I can have it in my purse for reapplication. Definitely not a safe blind buy, I think I prefer Vanilla 28 and the new Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar to this. Deduction of a star because the bottle came not completely filled, but that's a common issue with Kayali fragrances. The spray nozzle is somewhat atrocious at first, I had issues getting the bottle to properly depress. The spray is not fine, it comes out in a concentrated, haphazard spurt, which hopefully improves as I use it more since I feel like a more distributed mist would help with diffusing the soapiness in the scent and making it smell more well-blended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every single hype it gets honestly I have the travel size and am waiting on my full size debating on buying another large. so yummy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For all the fuzz it had I hoped for this to last longer than 1-2 hours. Pretty, just nothing different of special. Reminds me of a perfume I had in the late 90's early 2000's. that type of vibe. Very basic.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't live up to they hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So this is pretty.  But not amazing.  It sits very close to the skin.  The opening is fruity (and sorta reminds me of nail polish remover slightly).  The dry down is very cozy and warm--but not strong enough for me to smell it unless I press my nose into my arm.  I was really expecting longevity and sillage for all that everyone has said about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very mehu2026 smells like perfume from the early 2000s, nothing special. Opens up sharp and very floral, with some aftershave note that doesnu2019t really blend too well with anything else in this composition. After a little while vanilla comes forward and this perfume changes to a completely different scent. Based on other reviews Iu2019m guessing it has Vanilla 28 base and thatu2019s what Iu2019m smelling within an hour or so of wear. Longevity and sillage are ok, it wears closer to skin unless you overspray your hair and clothing. Doesnu2019t project much when applied to skin. If you didnu2019t get it for some reason and never had it in your collection before, you are not missing out on anything. It is not with the hype. Alsou2026  as to other peopleu2019s comparisons of this scent to Dama Bianca. This doesnu2019t smell anything like it. I wish it did. It might be in the same family of vanilla fruity florals, but thatu2019s about it. DB is blended to perfection and is a master piece. So I suggest to get that instead, especially if you can snag it at a lower price

reviews.review_title: Kayali's Best Fragrance, 100% Worth the Hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Silk Santal is in my top two of all time for fragrances. The champagne note is evident, unique and special. This is an easy reach, compliment getting signature scent worthy fragrance that can be worn day or night and all year around. Silk Santal is a perfect blend of beautiful notes that have an expensive, sweet and classic essence. Longevity/performance meet my expectations for an EDP, 4-6 hours and longer if layered. There are a lot of likeable fragrances but it takes a lot for me to purchase a full size bottle. Silk Santal is one of the most worn, complimented and versatile fragrances in my curated collection of 12 or less full size bottles. I fell in love during the original release and bought two more bottles recently bc I love it so much. The hype is deserved and I hope this becomes a permanent offering from Kayai!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected at all, very powdery, chemical smell. I really wanted to like this. I tried it on my clothes, on my skin.. it is definitely over hyped. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is what I imagined a pure vanilla scent to smell like. Its got a fizz from the champagne at first, however that dries down into a very close to the skin pretty vanilla. I love to layer this with my white floral heavy perfumes, just to add the extra oomph.

reviews.review_title: pistachio is the only one for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the hype for this perfume lead me to buy it. received today, it's mid. it is almost the same as Ariana MOD perfume, the white one. so when it becomes not available anymore, you can get that and it be about the same. doesn't last very long either. about 5 hours, and then it's even more subtle than it is fresh. it's a scent you can bear. nothing crazy or strong. very musky vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly a bit disappointed..all the hype around this scent and I just don't enjoy it as much as i hoped I would. The longevity is there but it almost comes off a bit old ladyish but I topped it with a vanilla cashmere lotion and it smelled better. I think this is one you need to layer

reviews.review_title: Canadians, wait for a Sephora sale!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I promised myself never to buy perfume for a full price, especially Kayali; but here I am. I blind bought this at a full price  because I fell for the restock of the limited edition  and the whole influencer hype. It's a typical Kayali fragrance. Perhaps the uniqueness is how airy it is. To me, it smells very similar to De ja vu white flower, a more light and airy version of it. I'm glad to have it, but a star off cuz I don't think it's worth its full price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty straightforward vanilla scent with a hint of fruit and sparkle.when I first tried it, it smelled like vanilla 28 and candy rock had a baby. But after 2 days I feel like itu2019s leaning more towards a slightly fruity and brighter vanilla 28. I definitely prefer this to van28. I do like it but the longevity is abysmal. For example. I just took a shower and doused myself in it, to head to bed. My baby woke up and I had to tend to her for a bit and by the time I got back in bed itu2019s now a skin scent. So I went back and did 5 more sprays. Iu2019m hoping itu2019ll last longer now. Itu2019s unfortunate that it dissipates so quickly because itu2019s a pretty scent.  Nevertheless, I feel compelled to get it in a travel size so when I wear it and it vanishes, I can do a touch up. Itu2019s that lovely. Off to order a mini.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a bad habit of blind buying fragrances, especially those that trusted fragrance influencers post about. This one I actually liked and was quite surprised, since the notes didn't seem that interesting.  The most surprising part...the staying power was quite decent which is not the usual for Kayali perfumes. Worth the buy? Sure, especially since its limited edition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I was offered by Kayali and became so obsessed!! It's soft and romantic, making it perfect for special occasions or date nights. The nectarine and champagne notes give it a sweet touch without being too heavy. The dry down reminds me of Vanilla 28, but it's still totally unique. Overall, it's a great choice for anyone looking for a fancy yet subtle scent.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous, just make it permanent already!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous scent! Makes me feel so feminine and pretty. I blind bought the travel size after hearing everyone rave about it. I definitely can smell vanilla 28, but there are beautiful peach and floral notes mixed in. It is like you took a bright fragrance and wrapped it in coziness/ warmth. The only qualm I have is the scarcity of this perfume. I think the Kayali team would make so much more money if they added this to their permanent line up and got rid of a lesser loved fragrance. I would gladly buy this in a big bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got it today and it was a blind buy. You can't go wrong with this perfume ud83dudc9b  Its really good I understand the hype now. Really beautiful perfume it's 10 u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s beautiful but not what I expected. I blind bought the 50 ml and have been wearing it daily, I think Iu2019m growing to appreciate it more. Itu2019s a lot more floral than Iu2019m usually drawn to. Itu2019s warm and cozy, my favorite is the champagne note

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 4 stars because I downright love this perfume so much but I abhor the marketing and scarcity tactic used for it. Kayali has had more misses than hits for me but this really hit more than I thought. It's the most raved, loved, and sought out perfume in the entire Kayali line. Wouldn't it make more sense to get rid of a fragrance they're not selling well and replace it with this as a permanent staple? This is as popular as Vanilla 28. They'd make even more money. This is the only perfume I'd ever repurchase from Kayali. Such a shame with this marketing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: obssessed is an underestimate. perfect elegant and classy but sexy daytime scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous, feminine,  romantic, softly sweet, elegant, effervescent, delicate, classy, fruity, floral, sensual, woody, warm, creamy, musky, alluring, unique, addictive, inviting, and cozy.   This opens bright, fizzy, effervescent, softly sweet, fruity, and floral. As it dries down the amber-y vanilla becomes more prominent. It also deepens some and becomes more woody, sweeter, warmer, creamier, and more musky. This is where it really begins to truly shine for me. The delicate, warm, creamy, and woody sweetness of the vanilla, amberwood, and sandalwood blend so beautifully together with touches of sweet orange blossom and softly powdery musk. You become enveloped in the most gorgeous, elegant, sensual, and cozy scent bubble.   The notes that are the most prominent to me are the champagne, nectarine, orange blossom, vanilla, sugar, sandalwood, musk, and amberwood. The champagne and nectarine fade into these other notes the more it dries down making them more subtle, but they still whisper throughout the entire wear.   This is such a truly incredible fragrance that I find to be very wearable and a very easy reach. I think that it would be hard to not love this one. I think it works very nicely for year round wear as well as basically any occasion. It would make such a lovely signature fragrance. I also think that this one is a pretty safe blind buy. I'm so very happy to have it as part of my collection, it's one of my top favorites.   I get excellent performance with The Wedding Silk Santal, just like I do with all of my Kayali fragrances. The longevity is really impressive, it lasts the entire day and I can still smell it the next morning. The projection is very nice too, it radiates out at least a few feet from me. I only need a few spritzes to get this effect, so I do consider it to be a good value.
i love this so much ! So grateful for the restock !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: layer those with bbw in the stars and Burberry goddess, just trust me on this, it's so good

reviews.review_title: Artificial scarcity is lame. Just keep it stocked.
reviews.review_text: I think the idea of creating an artificial scarcity of this product as a marketing tactic is just so odd. People have been wanting a restock of this product for a long time, and instead of just restocking it permanently, they only are doing a limited release and in small bottles in order to create a craze and sell out and just a matter of hours. I would be more inclined to just buy a product that I know was going to be available then wait until midnight when it's released and try and get my hands on a bottle, especially when there's no reason for that. The fragrance itself is pretty great, but I would not say worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: JUST GOT MY BOTTLE!  I mean...she's gorgeous and hyped for a reason! I was once of the girlies saying this smelled like Vanilla 28 when I tried a sample months ago, but since being on my fragrance journey (mmhmm), maybe my nose has changed? She has that V28 DNA that we all love, but it is fluffier - the champagne and nectarine really come out to play at the top. I absolutely adore this fragrance, not to mention the bottle is just gorgeous. Here is hoping that Mona makes it a permanent in the collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I wasnu2019t buying into the hype with this one until I heard the girlies saying this was a lighter version of Vanilla 28. I do feel like it has a vanilla 28 base but I love this so much more. I think this is Kayaliu2019s best work. My only mistake was not buying this in the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this from the actual huda website since Sephora has been sold out and im OBSESSED !!! Like soooo in love with it. Debating another bottle for backup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this fragrance!! I get compliments every time I wear it out!! Wish it had a little bit longer staying power, but still great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent. From the moment I opened her up I Knew it would be beautiful and it is.. it actually lasts a nice amount of time on my skin. Itu2019s definitely a beautiful date night/ wedding scent.

reviews.review_title: Wish it smelt better on its own
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So sad about this one. It starts with a nice soft scent and then has a wet wood/urine type smell. Looked online and it said there is base note is Oatmoss and this ruined the scent. Layering with Juicy Apple or De Ja Vu White Flower is the only saving grace for this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was not expecting to love this fragrance as much as I do! Itu2019s sweet and light but also sexy. I have read the scent didnu2019t stay much but I had the opposite experience I work 10 hours and it stayed all day! Keeping for special occasions mostly due to limited edition

reviews.review_title: Iu2019m shocked by how much I love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work for Sephora and do receive a lot of fragrances but something drew me in to purchases both the wedding fragrances and OMG Iu2019m so glad I did! I definitely prefer silk sandal! Itu2019s just the right amount of sweetness u2026and I donu2019t typical love gourmand or sweet fragrance! I Iu2019m sad itu2019s limited I might need a back upu2019

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations right from the get go, and was not disappointed! It's sweet, slightly floraly, and sexy as hell! I can't help but keep smelling my skin, my clothes! I wish it had a bit more projection than it does but this is my newest favorite scent! Please please make it a permanent fragrance!

reviews.review_title: its good but doesn't last like all Kayali
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Kayali makes amazing scents.. HOWEVER, they have not been able to make scents that have longevity and projection. Before  I got this I seriously thought this formula would be suuuuper long lasting considering it was her wedding fragrance, but it's not at all. I thought this would be an exception from the rest of her perfumes.. I mean who wants to constantly have to reapply their perfume especially on their wedding night bc it has no lasting power? The smell is beautiful. it smells like it has a base of vanilla 28 with champagne in the opening and the nectarine in the dry down. its a pretty scent! also I was worried it was going to be too formal and unwearable considering it was designed for a wedding, but you could literally wear this every day its super effortless to wear. they need to reformulate literally all their perfumes so that they actually last and project. the scent itself is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can see why people say this is similar to Vanilla 28, but to me it lacks the spice note and smells lighter and more powdery. There is a fruity note in there somewhere but mostly I get white florals and vanilla/sandalwood. Itu2019s a beautiful scent and perfect for summer, but I do wish it lasted a bit longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume makes me feel ultra feminine and beautiful. I wish it wasnu2019t sold for just a limited time but I am happy to have the 1.7 oz. for special occasions. My husband loves it on me toud83dudc95ud83dudc90

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent makes me feel so womanly & sexy. I love it.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it butu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first spray I was in love. As it dried down I swear I was wearing Vanilla 28. Also sprayed it on me then my BF came by about 1 hour later and couldnu2019t smell it on me at all.

reviews.review_title: Skip this if you have Vanilla 28
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me, this is watered down Vanilla 28. Yes, itu2019s lovely. Yes, itu2019s layerable. Yes, itu2019s great if you donu2019t want the heaviness of Vanilla 28, which would make this one great for spring and summer. Bottle is gorgeous so Iu2019m keeping it in my collection but I was expecting more. I actually like the Velvet one better, tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful scent, you will keep smelling yourself.

reviews.review_title: Please keep this in the collection forever!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this fragrance, I already have both Silk and Velvet. I think I love Velvet a bit more but both are so elegant and seductive. Pair them together and youu2019re just Irresistible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent. I have all Kayaliu2019s and this is my favourite one hands down. Itu2019s beautifully blended, feminine, pretty, politely sweet, pleasant, with a kiss of nectarine. Lasting poweru2026 zero! I literally have to drench myself in this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it smells heavenly ud83dude2b one of my new favorite scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent itself is absolutely delightful, exuding a captivating sweetness that lingers delicately on my skin throughout the day. However, the atomizer is different from what I'm accustomed to from the Kayali line. Instead of the expected fine mist, it delivers a splash of perfume, leading to a more substantial amount being dispensed with each spray. It's difficult to control the amount of perfume I want to apply, as the splash is more generous than intended, and I have to be more cautious in my usage. As a result, I find myself running through this bottle faster than expected. Nonetheless, if you're willing to overlook this aspect and prioritize the fragrance, it's worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla28 and deja vu white flower. This perfume has definitely same DNA but Very different to me. It is such a beautiful flower scent and drydown is amazing. Very creamy and sweet and it is not that too strong. This one should be permanent!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like Vanilla 28 this hits the same. But instead of vanilla there is a tart warmth. Itu2019s wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blind buy. Iu2019m a huge fan of Kayali vanilla and YES this is a similar scent at first sniff. But itu2019s lighter, more like white-hot-chocolate-with-cinnamon vibes.. reminds me a lot like Nest Golden Nectar

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best Kayali so far in my opinion!  Itu2019s sweet but sophisticated!  So so beautiful!  Great job Mona!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s so annoying to me that people are actually advising those who have vanilla 28 to avoid adding this to their collection. I could only bring myself to buy a travel size bottle of vanilla 28 bc to my nose itu2019s a dense, resinous, lightly spiced dark vanilla. Itu2019s way too heavy to be worn in the summer heat to me. The Wedding Silk is on the other end of the spectrum. It opens with that familiar baccarat rouge 540 dna, then a sweet musk swoops in but not the Kayali musk scent used in the u201cMusku201d perfume, itu2019s more similar to Ellis Brooklynu2019s u201cMythu201d musk (so good btw). Thereu2019s also some beautiful florals in there that I canu2019t identify easily but theyu2019re def not the star of the show, just enough to add some delicate femininity in there. The final dry down phases are for sure vanilla, a creamy, velvety but somehow also airy, sweet vanilla, more closely related to Good Girl Blush than vanilla 28. I wore the sample I purchased for a day and had multiple compliments with people needing to know what I was wearing. I ordered the full size bottle at midnight on the day it was released. The scent is romantic and sophisticated, it will be in my top scents in my collection for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: You canu2019t tell me this isnu2019t Vanilla 28 if she got married. Theyu2019re almost IDENTICAL itu2019s just this is slightly less intense. If you own Vanilla 28 you donu2019t need this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a sweet but light musk scent. It makes sense that people are saying itu2019s a lighter version of Vanilla 28 & I agree. I get the sandalwood and white freesia but I donu2019t smell the champagne note, regardless, keeping bc itu2019s a ud83eudd0dud83eudd0dpretty scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent, but zero lasting power. I donu2019t know why I keep trying Kayali, I know the lack of longevity is going to let me down every time.

reviews.review_title: I have 5 perfumes, love them all. Scents fade fast
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great, a really soft sweet not overpowering. However, when you first spray them they are amazing, but the scent doesnu2019t last long & I hate traveling with a glass bottle to reapply. Kayali knows what they are doing when creating these scents only msg is the lasting power. Bottles are also beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Call me crazy but this smells almost identical to vanilla 28 but way less intense. This is like a daytime version with less staying power. In the initial spray it smells fruity and sparkly. Five minutes in its just vanilla 28 after itu2019s been on your skin for 8 hours. I canu2019t justify keeping it but I do like it. If I wanted a daytime fragrance and I didnu2019t already have vanilla 28 Iu2019d be shouting from the rooftops about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty musky sweet peach /nectarine fragrance and blends well with Velvet santal.  The drydown has a marshmallow vanilla  like sweetness and I prefer it blended than worn alone.  very nice and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed, smelled way too sweet and it didnu2019t even last an hour on my skin even with moisturizer underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now all noses in addition to eyes will be on me! This alluring scent will be all over me on my wedding day! 9/23/23 ud83dudc8d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is amazinggg. Itu2019s a beautiful daytime, happy fragrance! I feel like if you love champagne and berries, this is a no brainer. Trust me, if you see this; pick it up! (Thank me later)
